name: Street Motorbike Rider 3D
description:
Prepare to try exciting Street motorbike rider 3D. Put motorcycle helmet, jacket, gloves, boots, get ready for speedy ride across city in bike game. This motorcycle simulator is for all those who like to drive and test their city driving skills on superbikes and dirt bikes.

City Motorbike Simulator – Fast riding challenges on roads
Moto racing on urban roads? Here is your chance to speed with multiple racer bikes on city roads. If you have played bike simulator or moto racing games before, you will absolutely like traffic racing. Drive fast and safe motorbike rider. Avoid police cars, big trucks and road blocks. Gain money to purchase better faster bikes. The bikes include super bikes as well as dirt bikes. Fast traffic racing is not easy. Prove yourself best bike rider! Must have game for motor bike riders & lovers of bike games.

Street Motorbike Rider 3D
This is not a kid motorcycle fun game, if you are up to motorcycle simulator challenge or if you want motorcycle Riding Simulator Games, then you must try it. Get Super Sport Moto riders or try dirt bikes, this is Challenging game! Move through urban environment with traffic on the roads. We will see if you can be motorbike rider to survive bike simulator challenging levels?

Please give us your feedback, rate or comment if you like this bike simulator! One of the best bike game.
